name: CryptoHandler
0:
”Alexa, open Crypto Handler”
”Alexa, ask Crypto Handler for price of Ethereum”
”What is the price of Bitcoin in rupees”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: crypto handler
des:
Crypto Handler will give you the real-time prices of various popular Cryptocurrencies in the alternate Fiat currencies like Euros, Indian rupees and U.S. Dollars. You will also be informed of the change in the value of the cryptocurrency since the last time you checked.

The following Cryptocurrencies are currently supported:
Bitcoin
Bitcoin Cash
Ethereum
Ripple
Litecoin
IOTA
(+a new cryptocurrency for every 10 new unique users who enable this skill)

Crypto Handler can provide the prices in Indian Rupees, U.S. Dollars and Euros.

Say "Alexa, Open Crypto Handler" to get started. 

Now try out,
"what is the price of Bitcoin in dollars?", and Alexa will tell you the current price of Bitcoin in US Dollars.
"what is the price of Ethereum?", and Alexa will tell you the current price of Etheruem in currency of your choice.
+ (Say anything else which conveys the intent)

Want to know the Supported Cryptocurrencies and Fiats? Try saying,
"what all currencies are supported?",
"which crypto currencies are supported?"
+ (Anything you might say to convey the intent)

All Prices are fetched using CryptoCompare API. Feel free to check them for more info.

SUPPORT

When you're done interacting with Crypto Handler for your favorite Cryptocurrencies, you can leave me your questions, comments, or feedback in the reviews! I would love to hear from you and it encourages me to make more great skills.

If you need support for any other cryptocurrency or fiat currency, just shoot me an email at akshitgupta1695@gmail.com and i will reply within 24 hours.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
